src_original: śāstur api me purastād ayaṃ bhikṣur yāvat trir api bhāṣitaṃ prativahati pratikrośati.
tgt_original: 彼故於大師所違反我說。

src_original: na ca me kaścit sabrahmacārī [Tib.152a] bhāṣitam abhyanumodate.
tgt_original: 又無同梵行苾芻稱讚於我。

src_original: yan nv ahaṃ tūṣnīṃ syāṃ.  athāyuṣmāṃ chāriputras tūṣṇīm abhūt.  tatra bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtam udāyinam āmaṃtrayate sma.  kaṃ punas tvam udāyinn anyatamaṃ divyaṃ manomayaṃ kāyaṃ saṃjānīṣe.  nanu yāvad evārūpiṇaṃ saṃjñāmayaṃ.
tgt_original: 我於今者唯應默然。

src_original: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtam udāyinam āyuṣmaṃtaṃ cānandaṃ saṃmukham avasādya bhikṣūn āmaṃtrayate sma.  iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ śīlasaṃpannaś bhavati.  samādhisaṃpannaś ca vistareṇa yāvad asti caitat sthānam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīty uktvā bhagavān utthāyāsanād vihāraṃ prāvikṣat pratisaṃlayanāyeti.  atrāyuṣmān udāyī ārūpyāvacaro 'yaṃ manomayaḥ kāya ukta iti manasikṛtvā pratibaṃdham akārṣīt.  tatra hi rūpaṃ nāsti.
tgt_original: 爾時佛告鄔陀夷曰。

src_original: tasmān manomayaḥ kāyaḥ.  tatra ceyaṃ samāpattir na samāpadyate iti tasyābhiprāyaḥ.  āryaśāriputrasya [Tib.152b] tu rūpāvacaro divyo manomayakāyo 'bhipretaḥ śuklaśoṇitam anupāyya prādurbhāvāt.  ata eva cāsāv āyuṣmān udāyī bhagavatā pṛṣṭaḥ.  kaṃ punas tvaṃ udāyinn anyatamaṃ divyaṃ manomayaṃ kāyaṃ saṃjānīṣe.
tgt_original: 汝以何等為意成身天。

src_original: (VII.38cd) yathāsūtram iti trīṇīmāni bhikṣavaḥ smṛtyupasthānāni.  yāny āryaḥ.
tgt_original: 如契經說。 有三念住聖者應習。

src_original: katamāni trīni.
tgt_original: 云何為三。

src_original: iha bhikṣavaḥ śāstā śravakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati anukaṃpakaḥ kāruṇiko 'rthakāmo hitaiṣī karuṇāyamānaḥ.
tgt_original: 謂如來為弟子說法時起深憐愍義利悲心告言。

src_original: idaṃ vo hitāya idaṃ vo sukhāya idaṃ vo hitasukhāya.
tgt_original: 此為利益此為安樂此為利益安樂。

src_original: [Tib.313b] tasya me śrāvakāḥ śuśrūṣante.  ājñācittam upasthāpayanti.  pratipadyante dharmasyānudharman prati.
tgt_original: 若弟子眾恭敬屬耳住奉教心。

src_original: na vyatikramya vartante śāstuḥ śāsane.
tgt_original: 行法隨法不越聖教受學學處。

src_original: tena tathāgatasya na nandī bhavati na saumanasyaṃ na cetasa utplāvitatvam.
tgt_original: 如來於彼亦不喜慶心不踊悅。

src_original: upekṣakas tatra tathāgato viharati smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan.
tgt_original: 唯住正捨正念正知。

src_original: idaṃ prathamaṃ smṛtyupasthānaṃ.
tgt_original: 是名第一念住。

src_original: yad āryaḥ sevate.  yad āryaḥ sevamāno 'rhati gaṇam anuśāsayitum.
tgt_original: 若有聖者善習此時乃應御眾。

src_original: tasya te śrāvakā na śuśrūṣante.  na śrotram avadadhati.  nājñācittam upasthāpayanti.
tgt_original: 若弟子眾不恭敬不屬耳不住奉教心。

src_original: na pratipadyante dharmasyānudharmaṃ.
tgt_original: 不行法隨法違越聖教不受學學處。

src_original: anyena vā kenacid iti.  aniṣṭavedanādinā.  vāsiṣṭhīprabhṛtīnām iti.  bhagavān mithilikāyāṃ viharati sma.  mithilāmravaṇe.
tgt_original: 曾聞佛住彌絺羅邑大自在天菴羅林內。

src_original: tena khalu punaḥ samayena vasiṣṭhasagotrāyā brāhmaṇyāḥ ṣaṭ putrāḥ kālagatāḥ.
tgt_original: 有梵志婦名婆斯搋。 喪失六子心遂狂亂。

src_original: sā teṣāṃ kālakriyayā nagnonmattā kṣiptacittā tenatenānuhiṇḍaṃtī yena mithilāmravaṇaṃ tenopasaṃkrāṃtā.
tgt_original: 追念子故露形馳走。 遇來入此菴羅林中。

src_original: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavān anekaśatāyā bhikṣuparṣadaḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ deśayati sma.
tgt_original: 遙見世尊多百千眾。 前後圍繞而為說法。

src_original: adrākṣīd vasiṣṭhasagotrā [Tib.57b] brāhmaṇī bhagavaṃtaṃ dūrād eva.  dṛṣṭvā ca punar jehrīyamāṇarūpā utkuṭakāsthāt.  smṛtiṃ ca labdhavatī.  adrākṣīt bhagavān vasiṣṭhasagotrāṃ brāhmaṇīṃ dūrād eva.  dṛṣṭvā ca punar āyuṣmaṃtam ānandam āmaṃtrayate sma.
tgt_original: 狂者見佛法爾便醒。

src_original: ihāyuṣmaṃto bhikṣuḥ śīlasaṃpannaś ca bhavati samādhisampannaś ca prajñāsaṃpannaś ca.
tgt_original: 若苾芻戒定慧具足者。

src_original: so 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāveditanirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca.
tgt_original: 能數數入出滅受想定。

src_original: asti caitat sthānam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.  sa na haiva dṛṣṭa eva dharme pratipady evājñām ārāgayati.  nāpi maraṇakālasamaye.
tgt_original: 彼於現法及將死時。 若不能辨如來聖旨。

src_original: bhedāc ca kāyasyātikramya devān kavaḍīkārabhakṣān anyatamasmin divye manomaye kāya upapadyate.
tgt_original: 命終超段食天處。 生在意成身天中。

src_original: sa tatropapanno 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāveditanirodhaṃ [Tib.151b] samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca.
tgt_original: 於彼復能數數入出滅想受定。

src_original: asti caitat sthānam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
tgt_original: 斯有是處應如實知。

src_original: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmān udāyī tasyām eva parṣadi saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhut saṃnipatitaḥ.  athāyuṣmān udāyī āyuṣmaṃtaṃ śāriputram idam avocat.  asthānam etad āyuṣmaṃ chāriputrānavakāśo yad bhikṣur anyatamasmiṃ divye manomaye kāye upapanno 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāveditanirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣtḥate cāsti caitat sthānam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
tgt_original: 時具壽鄔陀夷。

src_original: iti pūrvavat.  athāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitad abhavat.  yāvat trir api me ayaṃ bhikṣur bhāṣitaṃ prativahati pratikrośati.
tgt_original: 如是苾芻於大眾中再三違我竟。

src_original: na ca me kaścit sabrahmacārī bhāṣitam abhyanumodate.
tgt_original: 無同梵行者隨喜我之所說。

src_original: yan nv ahaṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmeyaṃ.
tgt_original: 今應詣佛決判此事。

src_original: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vaṃditvaikāṃte niṣaṇṇaḥ.
tgt_original: 頂禮雙足退坐一面。

src_original: ekāṃte niṣaṇṇaś cāyuśmāṃ chāriputro bhikṣūn āmaṃtrayate sma.  ihāyuṣmaṃto bhikṣuḥ śīlasaṃpannaś ca bhavati.  pūrvavat.
tgt_original: 告苾芻眾若苾芻戒定慧具。

src_original: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān udāyī pūrvavat.
tgt_original: 時鄔陀夷亦在彼會。

src_original: athāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitad abhavat.
tgt_original: 尊者爾時作如是念。
